JOB DESCRIPTION: B.E CSE IT ECE BCA MCA B.Sc CSC            Evaluating user needs and system functionality.   Ensuring that Technological facilities meet the needs of individuals and projects.   To have security backups of hardware and software systems   To assist in smooth running of all systems, including anti-virus software, print services and email provision;   To assist in providing secure access to the network for remote users;   To assist in securing of data from internal and external attack;   To providing users with appropriate support and advice;   Ensure that each computer is assigned an individual IP number.

EDUCATION.UG: BCA in Computers, B.Tech/B.E. in Production/Industrial, B.Sc in Chemistry
